original: de las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response to that is stated:

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs de las so //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs de las so //
translated: From that uncommon reason.

original: yod pa nyid ni yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: yod pa nyid ni yod pa nyid do //
translated: Existence is existence.

original: chos can gang la khyad par te bye brag de yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: chos can gang la khyad par te bye brag de yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which has that distinction, that particularity, is called that.

original: tsam gyi sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste /
analyzed: tsam gyi sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste /
translated: The word “only” is a restriction.

original: yod pa nyid kyi khyad par zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yod pa nyid kyi khyad par zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: It is called “the distinction of existence.”

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i bsgrub bya spyi'i chos can la ;
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i bsgrub bya spyi'i chos can la ;
translated: In that way, the general property of the probandum

original: grangs can la don 'ga' zhig kyang bsgrub par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: grangs can la don 'ga' zhig kyang bsgrub par mi 'gyur /
translated: is not established for the Sāṃkhya at all.

original: yon tan gsum la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan gsum la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the characteristics of the three qualities and so on are established.

original: des ni 'di skad du rang gi phyogs la ma grub pas /
analyzed: des ni 'di skad du rang gi phyogs la ma grub pas /
translated: This is what is being said: Because it is not established for one’s own position,

original: bsgrub par bya ba 'bras bu med par bstan te //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba 'bras bu med par bstan te //
translated: the probandum is shown to be pointless.

original: gzhan gyi 'dod pa nyid kyang bsgrubs pa yin @215a * //
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'dod pa nyid kyang bsgrubs pa yin @215a * //
translated: In order to demonstrate that the assertion of the other is also established,

original: no zhes bstan pa'i phyir de 'dra ba yang bkag pa med ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: no zhes bstan pa'i phyir de 'dra ba yang bkag pa med ces bya ba smos te /
translated: it is said, “That is also not refuted.”

original: de 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni spyi'i tsam mo //
analyzed: de 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni spyi'i tsam mo //
translated: “Such” is a general term.

original: 'dis ni grub pa la sgrub pa bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni grub pa la sgrub pa bstan to //
translated: This shows that the proof is established.🔽Or else,

original: yang na ; don 'ga' zhig kyang 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: yang na ; don 'ga' zhig kyang 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: no object would be established,

original: de 'dra ba yang bkag pa med //
analyzed: de 'dra ba yang bkag pa med //
translated: and such is not refuted.

original: yang gi sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
translated: The word “or” has the sense of “because.”

original: gang gi phyir de 'dra ba bkag pa med pa de'i phyir grub pa'i sgrub pa'i nyes pa yin pas don 'ga' zhig kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de 'dra ba bkag pa med pa de'i phyir grub pa'i sgrub pa'i nyes pa yin pas don 'ga' zhig kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because such is not refuted, therefore, since there is the fault of proving what is already established, no object would be established.

original: rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains this with “in any way” and so on.

original: yod pa nyid grub pa ni yod pa nyid du grub pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa nyid grub pa ni yod pa nyid du grub pa'o //
translated: “The establishment of existence” is the establishment of existence.

original: yod pa tsam khyad par can zhes bya ba ni yod pa nyid tsam khyad par can no //
analyzed: yod pa tsam khyad par can zhes bya ba ni yod pa nyid tsam khyad par can no //
translated: “The mere existence with a distinction” is the mere existence with a distinction.

original: gang la rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par ma bstan pa yod pa zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: gang la rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par ma bstan pa yod pa zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: The word “existence” is to be applied to that which does not indicate a specific nature.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni dngos po tsam sgrub par byed pa la /
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni dngos po tsam sgrub par byed pa la /
translated: “Here” is in the proof of mere thing.

original: yod pa nyid bsgrub pa 'gog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa nyid bsgrub pa 'gog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but not the refutation of the proof of existence.

original: 'on kyang rgol ba de 'di ltar spyi 'ga' zhig yod do zhes chos can 'di la khyad par te /
analyzed: 'on kyang rgol ba de 'di ltar spyi 'ga' zhig yod do zhes chos can 'di la khyad par te /
translated: But the opponent says this: “There is some universal, and this subject,

original: bye brag gzhan 'ga' zhig la reg pa med pa ste /
analyzed: bye brag gzhan 'ga' zhig la reg pa med pa ste /
translated: without touching some other particular,

original: gzung ba med na'o //
analyzed: gzung ba med na'o //
translated: without being apprehended,🔽this,”

original: 'dis zhes bya ba ni rgol bas so //
analyzed: 'dis zhes bya ba ni rgol bas so //
translated: the opponent says,

original: gzung ba'i khyad par zhes bya ba ni gzung ba'i bye brag ste /🔽yon tan gsum gyi bdag nyid can rtag pa nyid la sogs pas so //
analyzed: gzung ba'i khyad par zhes bya ba ni gzung ba'i bye brag ste / yon tan gsum gyi bdag nyid can rtag pa nyid la sogs pas so //
translated: “the particular of the apprehended,” the particular of the object,

original: khyad par gzung ba bsgrub bya 'dir te /
analyzed: khyad par gzung ba bsgrub bya 'dir te /
translated: by the particular of the object, by the particular of the subject, by the particular of the probandum, in this case,

original: gtso bo la sogs pa'i chos can la /
analyzed: gtso bo la sogs pa'i chos can la /
translated: in the subject, pradhāna, etc.,

original: gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba med pa can 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba med pa can 'gyur ba ste /
translated: the reason is non-pervading, i.e., non-concomitant.

original: 'di la bsgrub par bya ba'i khyad par dang dpe la rjes su 'gro ba yod pa ma yin pas rjes su 'gro ba med pa can te /
analyzed: 'di la bsgrub par bya ba'i khyad par dang dpe la rjes su 'gro ba yod pa ma yin pas rjes su 'gro ba med pa can te /
translated: In this case, the particular of the probandum does not exist in the example, and so there is non-pervading, i.e., non-concomitance.

original: dpe bsgrub par bya bas stong pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dpe bsgrub par bya bas stong pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the example is empty of the probandum.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa des yod pa bsgrub par bya ba yin na ste gdon mi za bar khyad par dag ni bsgrub par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa des yod pa bsgrub par bya ba yin na ste gdon mi za bar khyad par dag ni bsgrub par 'gyur /
translated: If it is to be established as existent, then the distinctions are necessarily established.

original: chos can zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: chos can zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains this with “the subject,” etc.

original: bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can nam zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / rmongs pa bdag nyid can te /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can nam zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / rmongs pa bdag nyid can te /
translated: “Having the nature of pleasure, etc.” means having the nature of pleasure, pain, and delusion.

original: de lta bur gyur pa yang gzhan gyis gcig pu yan lag med pa can du 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa yang gzhan gyis gcig pu yan lag med pa can du 'dod pa'o //
translated: Such a thing is asserted by others to be unitary and partless.

original: gzhan yin zhes bya ba ni byed pa po la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yin zhes bya ba ni byed pa po la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: “Other” means having an agent, etc.

original: ji ltar rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis kyang ji skad du bshad pa'i bsdus pa dang rgyas pa'i chos ngag gis khyad par du byas pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis kyang ji skad du bshad pa'i bsdus pa dang rgyas pa'i chos ngag gis khyad par du byas pa'o //
translated: In no way whatsoever is it distinguished by the qualities explained in brief and in detail.

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa khyad par gyi bye brag tu @215b byas pa rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa khyad par gyi bye brag tu @215b byas pa rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: “Its own nature” is the nature distinguished by the distinctions explained above.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
translated: “That” refers to the subject.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo khyad par can gyis mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su 'gro ba ma yin zhing rjes su zhugs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo khyad par can gyis mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su 'gro ba ma yin zhing rjes su zhugs pa ma yin te /
translated: “Thus” means that the example does not have the same nature as the property of the thesis, nor does it have a nature that is similar to it.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i dpe'i chos can ni ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i dpe'i chos can ni ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the example, which is supposed to be like that, is not established.

original: grub pa des zhes bya ba ni yod pa nyid tsam gyis te /
analyzed: grub pa des zhes bya ba ni yod pa nyid tsam gyis te /
translated: “By that establishment” means by mere existence.

original: yong pa tsam nyid la brjod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yong pa tsam nyid la brjod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no expression of mere existence.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhan gyi yin te /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhan gyi yin te /
translated: “Thus” and so on means that the opponent says this.

original: de ltar thal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gang spyi dang khyad par gyi rnam par rtog pa yod pa nyid du bstan pa'o //🔽'di ltar khyad par can gyi rten gyis khyad par du ma byas pa'i me la sogs pa yod pa nyid tsam mam /
analyzed: de ltar thal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gang spyi dang khyad par gyi rnam par rtog pa yod pa nyid du bstan pa'o // 'di ltar khyad par can gyi rten gyis khyad par du ma byas pa'i me la sogs pa yod pa nyid tsam mam /
translated: “Thus it follows” means that the existence of the universal and the particular is demonstrated.

original: rten gyi khyad par du byas pa bsgrub par bya ba yin grang na /
analyzed: rten gyi khyad par du byas pa bsgrub par bya ba yin grang na /
translated: Thus, the mere existence of fire, which is not qualified by a particular basis, or the existence of fire qualified by a particular basis, is the probandum.

original: phyogs dang po ni grub pa sgrub pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: phyogs dang po ni grub pa sgrub pa nyid yin te /
translated: If the first position is the case, then it is the establishment of what is already established.

original: de la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: The response to that is stated beginning with “Moreover, . . .”

original: de la yang zhes bya ba ni me la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba la'o //
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba ni me la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba la'o //
translated: “Moreover” refers to the establishment of fire, etc.

original: phyogs gnyis pa ni dpe bsgrub par bya bas stong pa yin te /
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa ni dpe bsgrub par bya bas stong pa yin te /
translated: The second position is that the example is empty of the probandum,

original: rten gyis khyad par byas pa can zhes bya ba gang smos pa ste /🔽me la sogs pa ni bsgrub par bya ba khyad par du byed pa yod pa de ni khyad par can rten yin la /
analyzed: rten gyis khyad par byas pa can zhes bya ba gang smos pa ste / me la sogs pa ni bsgrub par bya ba khyad par du byed pa yod pa de ni khyad par can rten yin la /
translated: because it is said that “it is qualified by the basis.”🔽Fire, etc., is the probandum, and that which qualifies it is the basis.

original: khyad par can gyi rten gyis me la sogs pa gang la khyad par du byas pa yod pa de ni khyad par du byas pa can te bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa de la'o //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi rten gyis me la sogs pa gang la khyad par du byas pa yod pa de ni khyad par du byas pa can te bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa de la'o //
translated: That which is qualified by the basis is that which is qualified by fire, etc. That is the probandum.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ma grub pa yin no //
translated: It is not established because it does not pervade the similar class.

original: rten gzhan dang 'brel pa'i me ni rten la 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rten gzhan dang 'brel pa'i me ni rten la 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: Fire that is related to another basis does not occur in the basis.

original: rten des zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni slob dpon gyi yin te /
analyzed: rten des zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni slob dpon gyi yin te /
translated: The statement beginning with “The basis . . .” is by the master.

original: rten bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can nyid du 'dod pas /
analyzed: rten bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can nyid du 'dod pas /
translated: Because the basis is asserted to be the subject that is to be established.

original: me la sogs pa la de khyad par du byed pa ni ma yin te /🔽gang na du ba yod pa de ni me'i spyi yod de /
analyzed: me la sogs pa la de khyad par du byed pa ni ma yin te / gang na du ba yod pa de ni me'i spyi yod de /
translated: It does not qualify fire, etc.,🔽because it is understood that where there is smoke there is the universal of fire,

original: 'di na yang du ba yod pa de bas na 'di na yang me'i spyi yod do zhes bya ba de lta bu ni me'i spyi nyid khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di na yang du ba yod pa de bas na 'di na yang me'i spyi yod do zhes bya ba de lta bu ni me'i spyi nyid khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because it is understood that where there is smoke here, there is also the universal of fire here.

original: gal te rten gyi khyad par byas pa med na /
analyzed: gal te rten gyi khyad par byas pa med na /
translated: If it does not make a difference in the basis,

original: 'o na ji ltar phyogs kyi chos shes de ltar khyad par du byas she na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar phyogs kyi chos shes de ltar khyad par du byas she na /
translated: then how is it that the property of the subject is known to be qualified in that way?

original: de mi ldan pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de mi ldan pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, “It is not connected to that,”

original: chos de chos can de lam 'brel par dogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par bcas pas khyad par du byas pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: chos de chos can de lam 'brel par dogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par bcas pas khyad par du byas pa'i phyir ro /
translated: because the property is distinguished by the exclusion of any doubt that it is related to the subject.

original: gong du phyogs chos de'i chas khyab pa ni zhes bya ba'i 'brel par phyogs kyi chos nyid ces bya ba yin gyi /🔽phyogs nyid kyi @216a * //
analyzed: gong du phyogs chos de'i chas khyab pa ni zhes bya ba'i 'brel par phyogs kyi chos nyid ces bya ba yin gyi /🔽phyogs nyid kyi @216a * //
translated: Previously, the connection was “the property of the subject is pervaded by that part of it,” but here the connection is “the property of the subject.”🔽The word “only” in the line “the property of the subject only” is not a term that is used to make a distinction.

original: chos zhes bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bshad zin cing le'u bzhi pa las kyang 'chang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bshad zin cing le'u bzhi pa las kyang 'chang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And in the fourth chapter, it will be said:

original: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, etc.

original: der zhes bya ba ni sa phyogs la sogs par ro //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni sa phyogs la sogs par ro //
translated: There means in a place, etc.

original: de mi ldan par rnam par bcad pas zhes bya ba ni sa phyogs la sogs pa'i chos can de la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pas so //
analyzed: de mi ldan par rnam par bcad pas zhes bya ba ni sa phyogs la sogs pa'i chos can de la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pas so //
translated: By the exclusion of its non-possession means by the exclusion of the non-possession of the property to be established in the subject, the place, etc.

original: de bas na spyi sgrub par byed pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa yod pa ma yin pa dang / de mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pas sgrub par byed pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de bas na spyi sgrub par byed pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa yod pa ma yin pa dang / de mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pas sgrub par byed pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Therefore, because of the establishment of the universal, there is no fault of non-pervasion, and because of the establishment by the exclusion of its non-possession, there is no fault of proving what is already established, that is the idea.

original: gal te gtso bo la sogs pa'i chos la mi ldan pa rnam par gcad pa na yang yod pa nyid tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gtso bo la sogs pa'i chos la mi ldan pa rnam par gcad pa na yang yod pa nyid tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If the mere existence is what is to be established even when the non-possession of the property of pradhāna, etc. is excluded,🔽then the reason would not be established.

original: de ltar 'dir yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: de ltar 'dir yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: In the same way, here also, etc.

original: 'ga' zhig la zhes bya ba ni gtso bo la sogs pa'i chos can la'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la zhes bya ba ni gtso bo la sogs pa'i chos can la'o //
translated: “In some” refers to the subject, such as the primal substance, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: gtso bo la sogs pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba'i don yon tan gsum la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can med pa'i phyir yod pa nyid du khyad par med pa can kho na yin te /
analyzed: gtso bo la sogs pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba'i don yon tan gsum la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can med pa'i phyir yod pa nyid du khyad par med pa can kho na yin te /
translated: Because the primal substance, etc., are not the referents of the words, i.e., they do not have the character of the three qualities, etc., they are only the general class of existence,

original: khyad par du gyur pa'i rten med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par du gyur pa'i rten med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no basis for the distinction.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi yin no //
translated: “Just as,” etc., is from the opponent.

original: chos can re re la yod pa nyid dang shes bya nyid la sogs pa chos ma yin pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: chos can re re la yod pa nyid dang shes bya nyid la sogs pa chos ma yin pa yod pa yin no //
translated: In each subject, there is the non-property, i.e., the property of being an object of knowledge, etc.

original: de la gal te yang gtso bo la sogs pa ni yod pa'i chos kyi ngo bor ma grub pa de ltar na yang shes bya dang brjod bya gzhal bya dag tu dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i chos nyid du 'dod pas gtso bo la sogs pa de
analyzed: de la gal te yang gtso bo la sogs pa ni yod pa'i chos kyi ngo bor ma grub pa de ltar na yang shes bya dang brjod bya gzhal bya dag tu dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i chos nyid du 'dod pas gtso bo la sogs pa de
translated: In that regard, although the primal substance, etc., are not established as the nature of the property of existence, still, since they are asserted as the property of existence and nonexistence, the primal substance, etc., are

original: yang grub pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: yang grub pa kho na yin te /
translated: It is established that it is an existent.

original: de la yod pa nyid spyi bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de la yod pa nyid spyi bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: And the existence of the universal is to be established.

original: re zhig 'dir yang chos can zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul du rtogs pa na bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid du gcig ni rtag pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dag tu grub par rtag pa nyid du mi nus te /
analyzed: re zhig 'dir yang chos can zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul du rtogs pa na bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid du gcig ni rtag pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dag tu grub par rtag pa nyid du mi nus te /
translated: When one understands the mode of the syllogism, such as “The subject, sound, is impermanent because of being a product,” then one cannot establish the particularities of sound, such as being the nature of pleasure, as impermanent,

original: khyad par de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because those particularities themselves are to be established.

original: de de bas ni 'di ni shes byas 'ga' zhig yod do zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de de bas ni 'di ni shes byas 'ga' zhig yod do zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should establish that some object of knowledge exists.

original: de bas na da ci zhes bya ba ni khyad par med pa yod do zhes bya bas don 'di 'grub pa ste /
analyzed: de bas na da ci zhes bya ba ni khyad par med pa yod do zhes bya bas don 'di 'grub pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of “what?” is established by “an undifferentiated existent.”

original: gtso bo la sogs pa grub pa yin yang bla ste /
analyzed: gtso bo la sogs pa grub pa yin yang bla ste /
translated: It is fine if the existence of the principal and so on is established.

original: med pa kho na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: med pa kho na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of “not at all” is that it does not exist.

original: shes bya yod pa nyid tsam brjod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: shes bya yod pa nyid tsam brjod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the mere existence of the object of knowledge is stated.

original: de nyid ni de ltar na @216b yang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de nyid ni de ltar na @216b yang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: That is the meaning of “in that case.”

original: mngon par 'dod pa cung zad kyang grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa cung zad kyang grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that not even the slightest bit of what is desired is accomplished.

original: 'o na me rjes su dpag pa na yang me tsam grub pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na me rjes su dpag pa na yang me tsam grub pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if fire is inferred, then since mere fire is established, it would not be the probandum.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: To this he says, “In another way.”

original: 'di na du ba yod pa'i phyir me yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa sbyor ba la'o //
analyzed: 'di na du ba yod pa'i phyir me yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa sbyor ba la'o //
translated: Here, since there is smoke, there is fire, and so on, in the application.

original: me'i spyi de nyid ces bya ba gang gis de la khyab pa'o //
analyzed: me'i spyi de nyid ces bya ba gang gis de la khyab pa'o //
translated: That universality of fire is the same as that which pervades it.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi bye brag la'o //🔽de yang de dang mi ldan pa bral ba can gyi zhes bya ba phyogs dang mi ldan pa de ni de mi ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi bye brag la'o // de yang de dang mi ldan pa bral ba can gyi zhes bya ba phyogs dang mi ldan pa de ni de mi ldan pa ste /
translated: In that, the particular place,🔽that is also devoid of it, that is, devoid of the place that is not endowed with it.

original: de dang bral ba'i phyogs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de dang bral ba'i phyogs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: That is devoid of that, that is, endowed with the place that is devoid of it.

original: spyi gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: spyi gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: That is what is called that.

original: phyogs khyad par can 'brel pa can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyogs khyad par can 'brel pa can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The particular place is related to it. This is the meaning.

original: rjes su 'gro ba ma grub pa kho na ni khyad par gyi phyogs dang 'brel ba can gyi spyi gzhan la 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ma grub pa kho na ni khyad par gyi phyogs dang 'brel ba can gyi spyi gzhan la 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: The reason is not established, because a universal that is related to a particular does not occur in another.

original: 'ga' zhig ces bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed de /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ces bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed de /
translated: He answers that with “some” and so on.

original: 'ga' zhig ces bya ba ni rigs pa shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ces bya ba ni rigs pa shes pa'o //
translated: “ Some” refers to those who know logic.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i don gyis zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi rten gyis khyad par du byas pa can gyi spyis so //🔽'on kyang gzhan te khong du chud par bya ba la khong du chud par byed pas du ba ni me med na mi 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i don gyis zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi rten gyis khyad par du byas pa can gyi spyis so // 'on kyang gzhan te khong du chud par bya ba la khong du chud par byed pas du ba ni me med na mi 'byung ba ste /
translated: “ By such a meaning” refers to a universal that is qualified by a particular that is its basis.🔽However, in order to make others understand, it is taught that smoke is not without fire,

original: me med par 'byung ba ma yin par bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: me med par 'byung ba ma yin par bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: that it does not occur without fire.

original: ci 'dra ba'i tshig gis she na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba'i tshig gis she na /
translated: By what kind of statement?

original: gang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says “where” and so on.

original: gang 'ga' zhig du ba yod pa de na me yod do zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: gang 'ga' zhig du ba yod pa de na me yod do zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: Where there is smoke, there is fire.

original: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni thams cad la khyab par nye bar sbyor ba bstan pas so //
analyzed: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni thams cad la khyab par nye bar sbyor ba bstan pas so //
translated: “Thus” is used to indicate the application of the pervasion to all.

original: de ni du ba'o //
analyzed: de ni du ba'o //
translated: That is the smoke.

original: me tsam gyis khyab pa grub pas phyogs can gang nas /
analyzed: me tsam gyis khyab pa grub pas phyogs can gang nas /
translated: Since the pervasion by mere fire is established, the place where the fire is located,

original: bdag nyid de du ba'i ngo bor 'khrul ba'i rgyu gsal ba can du snang bar 'gyur ba'i phyogs de nyid du phyogs 'di ni me dang ldan pa'o zhes me'i blo skyed par byed do //
analyzed: bdag nyid de du ba'i ngo bor 'khrul ba'i rgyu gsal ba can du snang bar 'gyur ba'i phyogs de nyid du phyogs 'di ni me dang ldan pa'o zhes me'i blo skyed par byed do //
translated: that very place which appears to have the cause of the error of the identity of smoke, that place is said to have fire, and the cognition of fire is produced.

original: de la ste shugs kyis rjes su dpag par bya ba khong du chud par de la'o //
analyzed: de la ste shugs kyis rjes su dpag par bya ba khong du chud par de la'o //
translated: In that, that is, by implication, the object to be inferred is understood.

original: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pas cir yang mi rung zhing dgos pa med de de med par yang bsgrub par bya ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pas cir yang mi rung zhing dgos pa med de de med par yang bsgrub par bya ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The indication of the probandum is not suitable in any way and is purposeless, because the probandum is established even without it.

original: de nyid ni de ni de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: de nyid ni de ni de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: That itself is stated by “that is in that,” and so on.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de la rtags mthong ba de la bstan pa tsam dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can dang rtags kyi 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de la rtags mthong ba de la bstan pa tsam dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can dang rtags kyi 'brel pa ste /
translated: The mere indication of the reason seen in the subject to be established and the relation of the reason to the subject to be established,

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa @217a * //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa @217a * //
translated: that is, the indication of the definition of positive and negative concomitance,

original: de bstan pa tsam gyis dogs pa 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: de bstan pa tsam gyis dogs pa 'dod pa ste /
translated: is the desire of the opponent,

original: bsgrub par bya ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the thesis is established.

original: gang gi tshe chos can ma bstan pa de'i tshe /🔽de ma bstan par yang ji ltar de khyad par du byas pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe chos can ma bstan pa de'i tshe / de ma bstan par yang ji ltar de khyad par du byas pa ste /
translated: When the subject is not indicated, then at that time,🔽how could it be qualified by that,

original: bsgrub par byas pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba yin pas /
analyzed: bsgrub par byas pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba yin pas /
translated: that is, how could it be qualified by the subject to be established, since it is not indicated?

original: gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, there would be the fault of the absence of positive concomitance.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore means for that reason.

original: du ba 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos me med na mi 'byung bar grub pa'i phyogs gang yin pa de ni mi ldan pa rnam par gcad pa yin te /
analyzed: du ba 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos me med na mi 'byung bar grub pa'i phyogs gang yin pa de ni mi ldan pa rnam par gcad pa yin te /
translated: This smoke is established as not occurring without the property to be established, fire. That place which is the locus of the property to be established is the exclusion of the non-possessor.

original: phyogs me dang ldan par sgrub byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyogs me dang ldan par sgrub byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: the proof of the possession of fire.

original: phyir ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: phyir ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: The reason is “because.”

original: de ni phyogs so //
analyzed: de ni phyogs so //
translated: That is the position.

original: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni me dang ldan pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni me dang ldan pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: “Thus” means that it is to be proven that it possesses fire.

original: tshad ma'i bya ba'i phyogs 'byung ba nyid kyis yin gyi /
analyzed: tshad ma'i bya ba'i phyogs 'byung ba nyid kyis yin gyi /
translated: The position of the activity of the valid cognition is that it is the arising of the reason.

original: 'di ltar nye bar dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba can te /
analyzed: 'di ltar nye bar dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba can te /
translated: In this way, it is preceded by the statement of the position.

original: phyogs khyad par can dang 'brel pa can gyi me tsam nye bar dgod pa sngon du 'brel pa can gyi rjes su 'gro ba can gyi rjes su 'gro ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: phyogs khyad par can dang 'brel pa can gyi me tsam nye bar dgod pa sngon du 'brel pa can gyi rjes su 'gro ba can gyi rjes su 'gro ba yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that the mere fire related to the particular position is stated first, and then the pervasion is stated.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa 'dir te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa 'dir te /
translated: It is because the statement of the probandum is here,

original: sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba'i tshe yan lag nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba'i tshe yan lag nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: at the time of the application of the proof, it is not a part of it.

original: gzhan yang phyogs nye bar dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba can kho na rjes su 'gro ba yin pa de'i tshe de sngon du song ba can te /
analyzed: gzhan yang phyogs nye bar dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba can kho na rjes su 'gro ba yin pa de'i tshe de sngon du song ba can te /
translated: Moreover, when the pervasion is preceded by the statement of the position, then it is preceded by that.

original: phyogs nye bar dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi rjes su 'gro ba ni rigs pas grub pa yin na /
analyzed: phyogs nye bar dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi rjes su 'gro ba ni rigs pas grub pa yin na /
translated: If the pervasion is established by the forward pervasion, which is preceded by the statement of the position,

original: dam bcas sgrub par byed pas ci zhig sel bar byed de /
analyzed: dam bcas sgrub par byed pas ci zhig sel bar byed de /
translated: then what is eliminated by the proof of the thesis?

original: phyogs bstan pa de'i tshe yang sgrub par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs bstan pa de'i tshe yang sgrub par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because at the time of stating the position, it is the proof itself.

original: de ltar yang ma yin pa de'i tshe na de'i phyogs bstan pa med par bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyis rtags la khyab par bstan par bya'o zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin pa de'i tshe na de'i phyogs bstan pa med par bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyis rtags la khyab par bstan par bya'o zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: If it is not like that, then at that time, without stating its position, one should state the pervasion of the reason by the general property of the probandum.

original: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po yang de dag bzhed do zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po yang de dag bzhed do zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to show that Master Dignaga also accepts those,

original: de skad du yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /🔽gzhan la yang zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi chos dang 'brel pa btang nas /
analyzed: de skad du yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la / gzhan la yang zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi chos dang 'brel pa btang nas /
translated: it is said thus... and so on.

original: gzung ba med pa can gyi rten gyi khyad par gyi chos can tsam gzhan la'o //
analyzed: gzung ba med pa can gyi rten gyi khyad par gyi chos can tsam gzhan la'o //
translated: In another means in another subject that is related to a specific property, having abandoned the connection with a specific property.🔽It is without an object, and is only a specific subject that is the basis.

original: gzhan dag ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can las gzhan pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can las gzhan pa ste /
translated: Others are different from the subject to be established.

original: dpe'i chos can la zhes bya ba 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: dpe'i chos can la zhes bya ba 'chad par byed de /
translated: They explain that the example subject is different from the subject to be established.

original: de yang mi rigs ta thams cad la khyab par nges pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang mi rigs ta thams cad la khyab par nges pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is also unreasonable, because it is necessary to show the certainty of pervasion of all.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang gtan tshigs te du ba la sogs pa @217b ni ma 'khrul ba yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang gtan tshigs te du ba la sogs pa @217b ni ma 'khrul ba yin no //
translated: The property to be established and the reason, such as smoke, are non-erroneous.

original: ci'i phyir ma 'khrul pa bstan ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma 'khrul pa bstan ce na /
translated: Why is non-erroneous shown?

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: It is stated with there.

original: rtsod pa'i gzhir 'gyur ba'i chos can de dag la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can med na mi 'byung ba nyid du bstan pa'i rtags rab tu grub cing nges pa de dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i gzhir 'gyur ba'i chos can de dag la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can med na mi 'byung ba nyid du bstan pa'i rtags rab tu grub cing nges pa de dang ldan pa ste /
translated: In those subjects that become the basis of dispute, the sign that is taught as the non-occurrence of the property to be established without it is well established and ascertained. It is endowed with that.

original: khyad par du bya ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can khong du chud par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: khyad par du bya ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can khong du chud par byed pa yin no //
translated: It is understood that the subject to be established has the property that is to be distinguished.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa yin no //
translated: Therefore and so on is the conclusion.

original: ji ltar yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa yod pa de ltar gtan tshigs la yang zhes gang smra ba de'i lan ni /
analyzed: ji ltar yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa yod pa de ltar gtan tshigs la yang zhes gang smra ba de'i lan ni /
translated: The response to that is:

original: gzung ba med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gzung ba med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “Without an object, etc.”

original: gzung ba med pa can ni nye bar gzung ba yod pa nyid kyi bye brag de'i khyad par dngos po tsam ste /
analyzed: gzung ba med pa can ni nye bar gzung ba yod pa nyid kyi bye brag de'i khyad par dngos po tsam ste /
translated: “Without an object” is the mere thing that is the particular of the existence of the object.

original: yod pa nyid tsam gang yin pa de ni sgrub par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: yod pa nyid tsam gang yin pa de ni sgrub par byed pa yin na /
translated: If mere existence is the proof,

original: yod pa tsam de ni de'i dpe'i chos can gyi rjes su 'gro zhing 'jug pa la 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa tsam de ni de'i dpe'i chos can gyi rjes su 'gro zhing 'jug pa la 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: then that mere existence is not contradictory in the pervasion and engagement of the example subject.

original: dngos po tsam grub par byed pa yin na bsgrub par bya ba ji lta bu zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po tsam grub par byed pa yin na bsgrub par bya ba ji lta bu zhig yin zhe na /
translated: If mere thing is the proof, what is the probandum?

original: de tsam khyab byed ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de tsam khyab byed ces bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, “That mere pervasion,”

original: yod pa nyid tsam khyab par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa nyid tsam khyab par byed pa'o //
translated: mere existence is the pervader.

original: rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad pa la dngos po tsam khyab par byed pa dang / sgrub par byed pa'i chos la yang rang gi ngo bo khyad par yongs su gzung ba med pa sgrub par byed pa yod pa nyid byed pa yin na yang rjes su 'gro ba la 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad pa la dngos po tsam khyab par byed pa dang / sgrub par byed pa'i chos la yang rang gi ngo bo khyad par yongs su gzung ba med pa sgrub par byed pa yod pa nyid byed pa yin na yang rjes su 'gro ba la 'gal ba med do //
translated: He explains this with “the mere nature, etc.” The mere nature of the thing to be pervaded and the proving property is the proving property. Even when existence is the proving property, there is no contradiction in the pervasion.

original: dpe sgrub par byed pa stong pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dpe sgrub par byed pa stong pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The example is not established. This is the meaning.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa yod pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa yod pa nyid la'o //
translated: “ In that” refers to the existence of the proving property.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: yod pa nyid tsam la brten pa yang zhes bya ba smos te ;
analyzed: yod pa nyid tsam la brten pa yang zhes bya ba smos te ;
translated: He says, “Even when based on mere existence.”

original: yod pa tsam la brten pa ni yod pa nyid tsam la brten pa ste /
analyzed: yod pa tsam la brten pa ni yod pa nyid tsam la brten pa ste /
translated: Based on mere existence is based on mere existence.

original: gtan tshigs nyid du brten pa la yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid du brten pa la yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that even when based on the reason.

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: It is not even the probandum.

original: yod pa nyid kyi khyad par gyi rten ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa nyid kyi khyad par gyi rten ma yin no //
translated: It is not the basis of the distinction of existence.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: yod pa tsam nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: yod pa tsam nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
translated: If mere existence is the probandum,

original: sgrub par byed pa 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //🔽yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i skyon bsgrub par bya ba'i sgo nas bstan nas /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro // yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i skyon bsgrub par bya ba'i sgo nas bstan nas /
translated: then the proof is pointless.🔽Having shown the fault in the probandum, existence, from the point of view of the proof,

original: sgrub par byed pa'i sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: he shows the fault from the point of view of the proof:

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /🔽yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la gtan tshigs yod pa'i chos sam med pa'i chos sam yod pa @218a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la gtan tshigs yod pa'i chos sam med pa'i chos sam yod pa @218a * //
translated: Moreover, if existence is the probandum,

original: dang med pa'i chos shig ston na /
analyzed: dang med pa'i chos shig ston na /
translated: then if you state a reason that is a property of an existent, a property of a nonexistent, or a property of both existent and nonexistent,

original: de la ma grub pa la ste gtso bo la sogs pa'i chos can la yod chos min zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de la ma grub pa la ste gtso bo la sogs pa'i chos can la yod chos min zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin no //
translated: then in regard to that, the reason is not established with respect to the subject, such as pradhāna, because it is not a property of the subject.

original: gnyi ga la ste /
analyzed: gnyi ga la ste /
translated: If it is a property of both,

original: yod pa dang med pa'i chos la brten pa de ni yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la 'khrul pa ste /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa'i chos la brten pa de ni yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la 'khrul pa ste /
translated: then that which is based on a property of an existent and a property of a nonexistent is mistaken in the proof of existence.

original: ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: ma nges pa yin no //
translated: It is indefinite.

original: med pa'i chos gang yin pa de yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: med pa'i chos gang yin pa de yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la 'gal ba yin te /
translated: That which is a nonexistent fact is contradictory to the proof of existence.

original: med pa nyid kho na bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa nyid kho na bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is only nonexistence that is to be proven.

original: yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba gang la yang ma grub pa la sogs pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid yod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba gang la yang ma grub pa la sogs pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid yod pa ma yin na /
translated: Since there is no reason at all for the proof of existence, because of the fault of nonestablishment, etc.,

original: ji ltar yod pa nyid de bsgrub par 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar yod pa nyid de bsgrub par 'gyur /
translated: how can existence be proven?

original: gtan tshigs de zhes bya ba ni yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de zhes bya ba ni yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs so //
translated: The reason is called “that” because it is a reason that proves existence.

original: skyon gyi rnam pa gang la skyon gyi rigs kyi yan lag gsum pa yod pa de ni gsum dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: skyon gyi rnam pa gang la skyon gyi rigs kyi yan lag gsum pa yod pa de ni gsum dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: That which has the third part of the type of fault is “possessed of three,”

original: de ni ci rigs par ma 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni ci rigs par ma 'das pa yin no //
translated: and that is not avoided in any way.

original: nyes pa gsum po de yang ma grub pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan te /
analyzed: nyes pa gsum po de yang ma grub pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan te /
translated: Those three faults are taught by “nonestablishment,” etc.

original: 'gal ba zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'gal ba zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba nyid do //
translated: “Contradictory” means contradiction.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de nyid rnam par 'byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de nyid rnam par 'byed pa yin te /
translated: “That” and so on analyze that.

original: gtan tshigs yod pa'i chos shig ston na de 'bras bu'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: gtan tshigs yod pa'i chos shig ston na de 'bras bu'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'am /
translated: If you demonstrate a phenomenon that has a reason, then it would be the nature of the effect,

original: de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba zhig grang na /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba zhig grang na /
translated: or it would be its intrinsic reality.

original: re zhig phyogs dang po ni ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig phyogs dang po ni ma yin te /
translated: First, that is not so,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid ma grub pa'i phyir ro //🔽rgyu'i khyad par gyis rgyu 'bras bu'i dngos po grub pa ni mngon sum dang mi 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid ma grub pa'i phyir ro // rgyu'i khyad par gyis rgyu 'bras bu'i dngos po grub pa ni mngon sum dang mi 'gal ba yin te /
translated: because the state of cause and effect itself is not established.🔽The establishment of the state of cause and effect by the distinction of cause is not contradicted by perception,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i 'bras bu'i ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can rgyu tsam rtogs par byed pa yin gyi khyad par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i 'bras bu'i ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can rgyu tsam rtogs par byed pa yin gyi khyad par ni ma yin no //
translated: because it causes the mere understanding of the effect, which has the characteristic of the state of cause and effect, but not the distinction.

original: ci ste phyogs gnyis pa yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: ci ste phyogs gnyis pa yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: But if the second position is the case,

original: yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la /
analyzed: yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la /
translated: then in the proof of existence,

original: gal te chos can gyi rang bzhin gyi chos can gtan tshigs su ston na /
analyzed: gal te chos can gyi rang bzhin gyi chos can gtan tshigs su ston na /
translated: if you demonstrate the intrinsic reality of the subject as the reason,

original: gtso bo la sogs pa ji ltar yod pa ma grub pa can du 'gyur /
analyzed: gtso bo la sogs pa ji ltar yod pa ma grub pa can du 'gyur /
translated: then how could the existence of pradhāna and so on be unestablished?

original: gang gi rgol ba 'ga' zhig gtso bo la sogs pa'i chos su gtan tshigs 'dod na de ji ltar gtso bo la sogs pa'i dngos por mi 'dod de /
analyzed: gang gi rgol ba 'ga' zhig gtso bo la sogs pa'i chos su gtan tshigs 'dod na de ji ltar gtso bo la sogs pa'i dngos por mi 'dod de /
translated: If some opponent asserts that the reason is a quality of the primary nature and so on, then why would it not be asserted as a primary nature and so on?

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid de chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid de chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the essence of the nature of things is reality.

original: gal te 'o na ji ltar rang bzhin gyi chos 'di ni zhes ldog pa'i sgo nas brjod ce na /
analyzed: gal te 'o na ji ltar rang bzhin gyi chos 'di ni zhes ldog pa'i sgo nas brjod ce na /
translated: If that is so, then why is this quality of nature expressed in terms of an exclusion?

original: rang bzhin ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: rang bzhin ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: The response is “Nature is not dependent on another” and so on.

original: 'ga' zhig la ltos nas zhes bya ba ni khyad par gzhan spong ba dang mi spong ba'i mtshan nyid can gyis so //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la ltos nas zhes bya ba ni khyad par gzhan spong ba dang mi spong ba'i mtshan nyid can gyis so //
translated: “In dependence on something” refers to the characteristics of the abandonment and non-abandonment of other distinctions.

original: 'di ltar khyad par gzhan mi spong bas chos @218b can rnam par gzhag nas de nyid la yang khyad par gzhan spangs nas chos nyid du rnam par gzhag la de ltar brda byas nas /
analyzed: 'di ltar khyad par gzhan mi spong bas chos @218b can rnam par gzhag nas de nyid la yang khyad par gzhan spangs nas chos nyid du rnam par gzhag la de ltar brda byas nas /
translated: Thus, having established the subject by not abandoning other distinctions, having also abandoned other distinctions in that subject, reality is established.

original: chos can las tha dad pa can bzhin te bzlog pa dang 'dra bar rtogs pa po'i 'dod pa'i dor byas nas bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: chos can las tha dad pa can bzhin te bzlog pa dang 'dra bar rtogs pa po'i 'dod pa'i dor byas nas bstan pa yin no //
translated: It is like the subject, but the opposite is understood, having discarded what the proponent of the argument desires.

original: de yang gong du nges par byas zin to zhes bstan pa'i phyir chos dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de yang gong du nges par byas zin to zhes bstan pa'i phyir chos dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that this has already been ascertained above, he says “The property,” and so on.

original: khyad par gzhan ni spong ba dang / mi spong ba dag de gnyis kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad zin to //
analyzed: khyad par gzhan ni spong ba dang / mi spong ba dag de gnyis kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad zin to //
translated: The other distinction is explained by “the two: the exclusion and the non-exclusion,” and so on.

original: ci ste yang gnyi ga'i chos gtan tshigs yin par smra na /
analyzed: ci ste yang gnyi ga'i chos gtan tshigs yin par smra na /
translated: But if you say that the property of both is the reason,

original: ji ltar na dngos po'i chos dngos po med pa'i chos su 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar na dngos po'i chos dngos po med pa'i chos su 'gyur /
translated: how could the property of an existent be the property of a non-existent?

original: gang gis gnyi ga'i chos gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir dngos po la mi rten pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gang gis gnyi ga'i chos gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir dngos po la mi rten pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that the property of both could be the reason, he says “not not based on the existent,” and so on.

original: de ni gal te bsgrub pa'i sgo nas dngos po'i bdag nyid kyi chos khas blangs nas med pa'i chos brjod pa'am gcig dgag pa'i sgo nas de la bzlog pa'i dngos po la brten pa'i bdag nyid can ma yin par dgag pa 'jug pas dngos po'i chos khas blangs
analyzed: de ni gal te bsgrub pa'i sgo nas dngos po'i bdag nyid kyi chos khas blangs nas med pa'i chos brjod pa'am gcig dgag pa'i sgo nas de la bzlog pa'i dngos po la brten pa'i bdag nyid can ma yin par dgag pa 'jug pas dngos po'i chos khas blangs
translated: If one accepts a phenomenon that has the nature of an entity by way of establishing it, and then expresses the non-existence of a phenomenon, or if one engages in a negation that is a negation that is not based on an entity that is the opposite of that by way of a negation, then, having accepted a phenomenon that is an entity, one would express non-existence, and that would be contradictory.

original: nas med pa brjod na yang 'gal bar 'gyur na de yang med do zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: nas med pa brjod na yang 'gal bar 'gyur na de yang med do zhes bstan zin to //
translated: But that does not exist, as has already been explained.

original: gang gi phyir ldog pa tsam ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ldog pa tsam ste /
translated: Because it is a mere negation,

original: gzhan bkag pa tsam chos nyid du brtags pa ni med pa la yang 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan bkag pa tsam chos nyid du brtags pa ni med pa la yang 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: a mere negation of another, a mere conceptual phenomenon, is not contradictory even in the case of non-existence.

original: de ldog pa smos pa ni bsgrub pa'i sgo nas gzung ba'i chos gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: de ldog pa smos pa ni bsgrub pa'i sgo nas gzung ba'i chos gsal ba yin no //
translated: The mention of its negation clarifies the phenomenon that is apprehended by way of establishment.

original: tsam smos pa ni dgag pa'i thabs kyi thob pa 'di dngos po la brten pa'i bdag nyid can gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: tsam smos pa ni dgag pa'i thabs kyi thob pa 'di dngos po la brten pa'i bdag nyid can gsal ba yin no //
translated: The mention of “mere” clarifies that this method of negation is not based on an entity.

original: ci'i phyir ldog pa tsam kho nar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ldog pa tsam kho nar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why is it just a mere negation?

original: ma yin par dgag pa ma yin pas zhes bya ba dgag pa gtso bo ma yin pa can gyi sgrub pa ma yin par dgag pa yin te /
analyzed: ma yin par dgag pa ma yin pas zhes bya ba dgag pa gtso bo ma yin pa can gyi sgrub pa ma yin par dgag pa yin te /
translated: It is an affirming negative, not a non-affirming negative, because it is not a proof that has a negation as its main object.

original: de yang mi rten pa tsam yin no //
analyzed: de yang mi rten pa tsam yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is only non-dependent.

original: de'i phyir ma yin pa dgag pa kho na mi rten pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir ma yin pa dgag pa kho na mi rten pa yin zhe na /
translated: Therefore, only non-affirming negations are non-dependent.

original: dngos po la mi rten pa can zhes smos te /
analyzed: dngos po la mi rten pa can zhes smos te /
translated: The phrase “that does not depend on an entity” is stated.

original: dgag pa tsam la dngos po mi rten pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: dgag pa tsam la dngos po mi rten pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That negation which is merely a negation is called that.

original: gang la gzhan rnam par gcad nas dngos po la brten pa de ni ma yin pa rnam par dgag pa'i yul yin /
analyzed: gang la gzhan rnam par gcad nas dngos po la brten pa de ni ma yin pa rnam par dgag pa'i yul yin /
translated: That which is dependent on an entity by the exclusion of other is the domain of non-affirming negations.

original: 'dis dngos po 'ga' zhig la brtan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dis dngos po 'ga' zhig la brtan pa ma yin no //
translated: This does not depend on any entity.

original: rnam par gcad pa tsam de nyid ni dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rnam par gcad pa tsam de nyid ni dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: That mere exclusion itself is like, for example, the statement “It is not form.”

original: gzugs can du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gzugs can ma yin pa yin pa de de nyid de /
analyzed: gzugs can du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gzugs can ma yin pa yin pa de de nyid de /
translated: It is not form. That is non-form.

original: gzugs can bkag pa'i mtshan nyid med pa na /
analyzed: gzugs can bkag pa'i mtshan nyid med pa na /
translated: When the characteristic of form is negated,

original: yod pa rten rnam par shes pa dang nye bar brjod pa @219a * //
analyzed: yod pa rten rnam par shes pa dang nye bar brjod pa @219a * //
translated: The existent is the basis, the consciousness, and the expression.

original: med pa ste med pa la yang 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: med pa ste med pa la yang 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
translated: The non-existent is the negation, the non-existence.

original: gal te nye bar brjod pa med pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan gyi yin te /
analyzed: gal te nye bar brjod pa med pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan gyi yin te /
translated: If you say that the negation of the non-existent, etc., is the opponent’s position,

original: yod pa bkag pa 'di ni bzlog pa yin la de yang bya ba yin na bya ba'i rten ma gtogs par bya ba mi rung ngo //
analyzed: yod pa bkag pa 'di ni bzlog pa yin la de yang bya ba yin na bya ba'i rten ma gtogs par bya ba mi rung ngo //
translated: this negation of the existent is the opposite, and that is the action. Without the basis of the action, the action is not possible.

original: de bas na med pa dgag pa'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na med pa dgag pa'i yul ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the non-existent is not the object of negation.

original: dgag pa'i yul nyid du med na yang ji lta ba ni chos kun du brtags pa yin zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
analyzed: dgag pa'i yul nyid du med na yang ji lta ba ni chos kun du brtags pa yin zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
translated: If it is not the object of negation, how can it be the imagined reality of all things?

original: med pa dag ni sgra dag kyang yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i skabs su nye bar brjod pa med pa'i dgag pa'i yul nyid kyang bstan pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: med pa dag ni sgra dag kyang yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i skabs su nye bar brjod pa med pa'i dgag pa'i yul nyid kyang bstan pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: In the section on the existence of the words of the non-existent, is not the non-existent the object of negation by the expression?

original: bden te 'on kyang yul med pa dgag pa'i sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'dis phyogs snga ma'i sgo nas bstan la /
analyzed: bden te 'on kyang yul med pa dgag pa'i sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'dis phyogs snga ma'i sgo nas bstan la /
translated: It is true, but it is not the object of negation by the expression, because there is no application of negation to the non-existent. This is the explanation from the opponent’s point of view.

original: de ni bya ba dang byed pa po'i 'brel pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: de ni bya ba dang byed pa po'i 'brel pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: “In terms of the relation between action and agent” is the distinction.

original: gal te nye bar brjod pa med na ni dgag pa'i yul nyid ma yin pa de bas na da ni spyi'i nye bar brjod pa med pa'i bsgrub pa'i yul yin na yang bla'o //🔽gal te yang ste med pa bsgrub pa'i yul nyid ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te nye bar brjod pa med na ni dgag pa'i yul nyid ma yin pa de bas na da ni spyi'i nye bar brjod pa med pa'i bsgrub pa'i yul yin na yang bla'o // gal te yang ste med pa bsgrub pa'i yul nyid ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If there is no expression of negation, then it is not the object of negation. Therefore, now, even if it is the object of affirmation without the expression of negation, it is fine.🔽If, however, it is not the object of affirmation, then it is not the object of negation.

original: nga ci lta med pa dgag pa'i yul nyid ma yin /
analyzed: nga ci lta med pa dgag pa'i yul nyid ma yin /
translated: How is it that nonexistence is not the object of negation?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dgag pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bsgrub pa log pa gang yin pa de nyid dgag pa yin te /
analyzed: dgag pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bsgrub pa log pa gang yin pa de nyid dgag pa yin te /
translated: In “negation is the opposite of affirmation,” the opposite of affirmation is negation.

original: bsgrubs pa dang dgag pa dag las gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrubs pa dang dgag pa dag las gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is nothing other than affirmation and negation.

original: log pa zhes bya ba'i dngos por gyur pa'i chos kyis bya ba 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin pa gang gis med pa dag la yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: log pa zhes bya ba'i dngos por gyur pa'i chos kyis bya ba 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin pa gang gis med pa dag la yang mi 'gyur /
translated: There is no entity called “opposite” that is a phenomenon that performs some action, by which it would also apply to nonexistents.

original: de bas na bshad ma thag pa'i rnam par gcad pa tsam yod pa de dang med pa gnyi ga yang yod pas bsgrub par bya ba yod pa nyid du ji ltar bdag gir byed /
analyzed: de bas na bshad ma thag pa'i rnam par gcad pa tsam yod pa de dang med pa gnyi ga yang yod pas bsgrub par bya ba yod pa nyid du ji ltar bdag gir byed /
translated: Therefore, how could one accept the existence of the probandum, existence, which is the mere exclusion of the existence of both that which has just been explained and nonexistence?

original: gang gi phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa'i dogs pa rnam par gcad pa'i sgo nas rnyed par byed pa de ni go bar byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa'i dogs pa rnam par gcad pa'i sgo nas rnyed par byed pa de ni go bar byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: Because it is obtained through the elimination of doubt regarding the occurrence of the discordant side, it is the very means of understanding.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa ni rab tu spyod pa ste /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa ni rab tu spyod pa ste /
translated: The occurrence of the discordant side is the activity.

original: de la dogs pa de rnam par gcad pa'i sgo nas so //🔽yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: de la dogs pa de rnam par gcad pa'i sgo nas so // yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa nyid yin na /
translated: Doubt regarding that is eliminated.🔽Even in the case of the proof of existence, nonexistence is the discordant side.

original: gtan tshigs gnyi ga'i chos kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa nyid las log pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gnyi ga'i chos kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa nyid las log pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The property of both reasons is not the mere reversal of nonexistence, the discordant side.

original: rgol ba de yang rang gi tshig ste rang gi brjod pa yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs su gnyi ga'i chos nyid smra ba na yod pa nyid las gzhan pa yang ste /
analyzed: rgol ba de yang rang gi tshig ste rang gi brjod pa yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs su gnyi ga'i chos nyid smra ba na yod pa nyid las gzhan pa yang ste /
translated: The opponent’s words, that is, his statements, are themselves the proof that existence exists. When he speaks of the nature of both, he is speaking of something other than existence.🔽

original: med pa la yang gtan tshigs gnyi ga'i chos 'di 'jug par brjod pa na'o //
analyzed: med pa la yang gtan tshigs gnyi ga'i chos 'di 'jug par brjod pa na'o //
translated: The opponent’s words, i.e., his statement, are the reason proving the existence of the property of the subject. When he states that the property of the two is existence, then the property of the two is also applied to nonexistence, i.e., the opposite of existence.

original: gal te @219b yod pa dang med pa la yang gnas pa de ltar na yang gnyi ga'i chos nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te @219b yod pa dang med pa la yang gnas pa de ltar na yang gnyi ga'i chos nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is said that the reason is present in both existence and nonexistence, then it is the property of the two.

original: yod pa nyid la gtan tshigs nyid du smra ba na /
analyzed: yod pa nyid la gtan tshigs nyid du smra ba na /
translated: When the reason is stated to be existence,

original: yod pa de la ma 'khrul par brjod pa'i phyir ji ltar 'khrul pa ma yin /
analyzed: yod pa de la ma 'khrul par brjod pa'i phyir ji ltar 'khrul pa ma yin /
translated: since it is said to be nonerroneous with respect to existence, how can it be erroneous?

original: yod pa nyid la med pa'i chos kyi gtan tshigs su brjod pa na yang rgol ba 'di'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur te yod pa nyid las ldog pa med pa nyid sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa nyid la med pa'i chos kyi gtan tshigs su brjod pa na yang rgol ba 'di'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur te yod pa nyid las ldog pa med pa nyid sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When the reason of a nonexistent property is stated with respect to existence, then the opponent’s reason is that the reason is existence because it proves the nonexistence that is the opposite of existence.

original: med pa nyid kyi chos su 'gyur ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: med pa nyid kyi chos su 'gyur ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the property of nonexistence?

original: dngos po tsam zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: dngos po tsam zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: The expression “mere entity” and so on.

original: dngos po tsam khyab par byed pa'i don byed nus pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don gang yin pa de rnam par gcod pa'i nges pa med pa nyid kyi chos yin te /
analyzed: dngos po tsam khyab par byed pa'i don byed nus pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don gang yin pa de rnam par gcod pa'i nges pa med pa nyid kyi chos yin te /
translated: The meaning of mere entity is the exclusion of the object that is the pervader, which has the characteristic of being a product, and so on, that is able to perform a function.

original: dngos po thams cad 'gog pa ni med pa kho na la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad 'gog pa ni med pa kho na la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the property of the absence of ascertainment, because the negation of all entities is only in the non-existent.

original: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'gal ba nyid ston par byed de /
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'gal ba nyid ston par byed de /
translated: He demonstrates contradiction with the expression “that” and so on.

original: de ni zhes bya ba dngos po tsam khyab par byed pa'i don rnam par gcod pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba dngos po tsam khyab par byed pa'i don rnam par gcod pa yin te /
translated: “ That” is the exclusion of the object that is the pervader of mere entity.

original: 'di ni mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid bstan to//
analyzed: 'di ni mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid bstan to//
translated: This demonstrates the absence of the property in the concordant class.

original: med pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: med pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa nyid do //
translated: “ The non-existent” and so on demonstrates the property of the discordant class.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
translated: “ Therefore” means “for that reason.”

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum po 'di yang yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa la ste /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum po 'di yang yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa la ste /
translated: And these three kinds of reason that have been explained are for proving existence.

original: yod pa nyid bsgrub pa la ji skad du bshad pa'i gtan tshigs gsum las rnam pa gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa nyid bsgrub pa la ji skad du bshad pa'i gtan tshigs gsum las rnam pa gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: For proving existence, there is no other kind of reason than the three kinds that have been explained.

original: yod pa nyid 'di'i phyir te /
analyzed: yod pa nyid 'di'i phyir te /
translated: Because of this existence,

original: khyad par gzung ba med par sgrub par byed pa nyid de rtags nyid yin no //
analyzed: khyad par gzung ba med par sgrub par byed pa nyid de rtags nyid yin no //
translated: the mere presence of the reason is the proof, without grasping any distinction.

original: yod pa nyid grub pa can te /
analyzed: yod pa nyid grub pa can te /
translated: It is established as existence,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la ma grub pa yin no //
translated: but not established in the subject that is to be proven.🔽What kind of distinction does the probandum have?🔽The mere presence of that is the proof.🔽The mere presence of that is the proof.🔽The mere presence of that is the proof.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos khyad par ji lta bu can de'i sgrub par byed pa nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos khyad par ji lta bu can de'i sgrub par byed pa nyid yin zhe na /

original: de tsam la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la yod pa tsam la khyab par byed pa mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa dngos po'i chos kyi'o //
analyzed: de tsam la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la yod pa tsam la khyab par byed pa mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa dngos po'i chos kyi'o //
translated: The mere presence of that is the proof.

original: de ni ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon gsal ba yin no //
translated: The mere presence of that is the proof.🔽The

original: 'gal ba dang ma nges pa nyid spangs pa'i phyir gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'gal ba dang ma nges pa nyid spangs pa'i phyir gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to abandon contradiction and uncertainty, the text says “if” and so on.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos des /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos des /
translated: If the predicate of the probandum

original: rtags la khyab pa rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis rjes su 'gro ba'am ldog pa'i sgo nas nges par byas pas 'gal ba dang 'khrul pa dag med pa ste /🔽'gal ba nyid dang ma nges pa nyid yin pa'i phyir yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la /
analyzed: rtags la khyab pa rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis rjes su 'gro ba'am ldog pa'i sgo nas nges par byas pas 'gal ba dang 'khrul pa dag med pa ste / 'gal ba nyid dang ma nges pa nyid yin pa'i phyir yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la /
translated: is ascertained by the evidence through the mode of positive or negative pervasion, then there is no contradiction or error.🔽Because there is no contradiction or uncertainty, the consequence just explained, “If existence is the probandum, then the evidence is not established,” and so on, does not exist.🔽If the predicate of the probandum is not ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does exist.

original: ma grub pa la yod chos med //🔽ces bya ba la sogs pa bshad ma thag @220a * //🔽pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba 'di ni med do bsgrub par bya ba ni chos kyi rtags la khyab pa'am /
analyzed: ma grub pa la yod chos med // ces bya ba la sogs pa bshad ma thag @220a * // pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba 'di ni med do bsgrub par bya ba ni chos kyi rtags la khyab pa'am /
translated: If the predicate of the probandum is ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does not exist.🔽If the predicate of the probandum is ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does not exist.🔽If the predicate of the probandum is ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does not exist.🔽If the predicate of the probandum is ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does not exist.🔽If the predicate of the probandum is ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does not exist.🔽If the predicate of the probandum is ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does not exist.🔽If the predicate of the probandum is ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does not exist.🔽If the predicate of the probandum is ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does not exist.🔽If the predicate of the probandum is ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does not exist.🔽If the predicate of the probandum is ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does not exist.🔽If the predicate of the probandum is ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does not exist.🔽If the predicate of the probandum is ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does not exist.🔽If the predicate of the probandum is ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does not exist.

original: chos can la brten pa ste phyogs kyi chos nyid la nges par ma byas pa can yod na yang de'i rang bzhin can nyid du ste /
analyzed: chos can la brten pa ste phyogs kyi chos nyid la nges par ma byas pa can yod na yang de'i rang bzhin can nyid du ste /
translated: If the predicate of the probandum is ascertained in the evidence or in the subject, then the consequence just explained does not exist.🔽If the

original: khyad par dang chos can la brten pa nges par byas pa'i rang bzhin can nyid du go par byed par 'dod pa ni go bar byed pa 'ga' zhig tu yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par dang chos can la brten pa nges par byas pa'i rang bzhin can nyid du go par byed par 'dod pa ni go bar byed pa 'ga' zhig tu yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: In particular, it is not a means of understanding if it is asserted that it is a nature that ascertains the subject and the attribute.

original: gtan tshigs de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: gtan tshigs de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la rang gi chos kyis khyab pa'i gtan tshigs ni grub pa'i rang bzhin go byed yin par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la rang gi chos kyis khyab pa'i gtan tshigs ni grub pa'i rang bzhin go byed yin par brjod par bya ste /
translated: it should be said that the reason that pervades the subject of the probandum with its own attribute is a means of understanding that has an established nature.

original: tshul gsum pa nyid du nges par byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: tshul gsum pa nyid du nges par byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that it is ascertained as having the three modes.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach just that,

original: gsal bar bya ba nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gsal bar bya ba nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says “because of the very act of illumination,” and so on.

original: gsal bar byed pa nyid kyis te /
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa nyid kyis te /
translated: Because of the very act of illumination,

original: 'od gsal ba nyid kyis sgron mas bum pa la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa yin na /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba nyid kyis sgron mas bum pa la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa yin na /
translated: if a lamp illuminates a pot and so on because of its own luminosity,

original: de lta bur gyur pa de 'ga' zhig gi tshe bum pa la sogs pa'i nang na gnas pa de'i ngo bo rtogs par byed pa ma yin pa ni rang gi don bya ba ka ba la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid can mi byed do //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa de 'ga' zhig gi tshe bum pa la sogs pa'i nang na gnas pa de'i ngo bo rtogs par byed pa ma yin pa ni rang gi don bya ba ka ba la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid can mi byed do //
translated: That which is such is not, at some times, the nature of that which is located within a pot, etc. It does not perform the function of its own object, which is to manifest the pillar, etc.

original: go bar byed pa'i rang bzhin ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: go bar byed pa'i rang bzhin ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni bshad zin to //
translated: The nature of the illuminator has been explained.

original: 'on kyang go bar bya ba ci 'dra ba zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang go bar bya ba ci 'dra ba zhig yin zhe na /
translated: But what is the nature of the object of illumination?

original: de la khyab byed nges pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: de la khyab byed nges pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: In response to this, he says, “The ascertainment of the pervader, etc.”

original: gang de go bar byed pa khyad par byed pa'i rang bzhin gang yin /
analyzed: gang de go bar byed pa khyad par byed pa'i rang bzhin gang yin /
translated: That which is the illuminator is the nature of the differentiator.
